Text:
Just for clarification, this patch is provided for the purpose of use with a purchased and legal copy of Apple OS X 10.5 Leopard. This patch was created from a backup image of the installation DVD that was purchased. 

All that one needs is the BrazilMac patcher and a Leopard image. How you acquire both is your legal responsibility. This patch does not contain anything more than modified drivers that the user should already own rights to, and is no different than Realtek distributing drivers that are modified but originally created by Apple.
